title: Person not showing up on friends list?
body:
So this random person just added me on LoL, and sent me some free riot points link or something.
So I just closed it, and proceeded to delete that person from my friends list, but the thing is, I couldn't find that person on my friends list.
Did he/she just instantly delete me afterwards or what?

replies.body:
Probably. It would prevent you from "ignore"-ing them.

If you're terribly concerned about it, send in a ticket to support detailing the information about it. As long as you didn't do anything like click the link, then you should be fine.
